title: Fresh Foam Roav
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam Roav delivers an unbeatable ride that is just as comfortable around the foot as it is underneath it. This versatile shoe keeps you comfortable on the go with signature Fresh Foam cushioning and a full ground contact outsole. The Ultra Heel provides a snug, locked-in fit and an updated color palette adds to the energetic look of these everyday athletic shoes.

title: Fresh Foam X 1080v12
description: If we only made one running shoe, that shoe would be the 1080. What makes the 1080 unique isn’t just that it’s the best running shoe we make, it’s also the most versatile. The 1080 delivers top-of-the-line performance to every kind of runner, whether you’re training for world-class competition, or catching a rush hour train. The Fresh Foam X 1080v12 represents a consistent progression of the model’s signature qualities. The smooth transitions of the pinnacle underfoot cushioning experience are fine-tuned with updated midsole mapping, which applies more foam to wider areas of the midsole and increases flexibility at the narrower points. The ultra-modern outlook is also reflected in the 1080’s upper construction. The v12 offers a supportive, second-skin style fit with an engineered Hypoknit upper, for a more streamlined overall design.

title: Fresh Foam X 880v13
description: Function meets performance the New Balance Fresh Foam X 880v13. Featuring a plush and supportive Fresh Foam X midsole and NDurance rubber outsole, this shoe delivers enhanced performance and comfort with each step. Complete with clean lines and simple style, this running shoe has a modern look that’s perfect for everyday use.

title: Fresh Foam X 860v13
description: Most people don’t make a routine out of a physically demanding activity that requires persistent effort to get any good at. Even fewer do that just for fun. It’s like we’ve always said – runners aren’t normal. We designed the 860 to keep up with the demands placed on shoes by the dedication of the stability-minded every day runner. The latest entry in the series, the Fresh Foam X 860v13 men's running shoe, augments the pinnacle cushioning experience of Fresh Foam X with a supportive medial post to provide essential stability. Built for reliability over the long haul and sustained comfort over all distances, the 860 is a true go-to shoe.

title: FuelCell Propel v4
description: New and experienced runners alike will appreciate the underfoot ride and innovative technology packed into the New Balance FuelCell Propel v4. Featuring a thick FuelCell midsole combined with a TPU plate, this running shoe is designed to maximize comfort and traction to help keep you moving at top speeds.

title: Fresh Foam X 1080v12 Lounge Around
description: If we only made one running shoe, that shoe would be the 1080. What makes the 1080 unique isn’t just that it’s the best running shoe we make, it’s also the most versatile. The 1080 delivers top-of-the-line performance to every kind of runner, whether you’re training for world-class competition, or catching a rush hour train. The Fresh Foam X 1080v12 represents a consistent progression of the model’s signature qualities. The smooth transitions of the pinnacle underfoot cushioning experience are fine-tuned with updated midsole mapping, which applies more foam to wider areas of the midsole and increases flexibility at the narrower points. The ultra-modern outlook is also reflected in the 1080’s upper construction. This Lounge Around edition brings the 1080 into your work-from-home life with neutral colors and soft, premium materials designed for everyday wear.

title: 574 Core
description: ‘The most New Balance shoe ever’ says it all, right? No, actually. The 574 might be our unlikeliest icon. The 574 was built to be a reliable shoe that could do a lot of different things well rather than as a platform for revolutionary technology, or as a premium materials showcase. This unassuming, unpretentious versatility is exactly what launched the 574 into the ranks of all-time greats. As hybrid road/trail design built on a wider last than the previous generation’s narrow racing silhouettes, the 574 offered a uniquely versatile mix of new, different, uncomplicated, rugged, durable, and comfortable that was adopted as a closet staple across the globe. That’s why today, the 574 is synonymous with the boundary defying New Balance style, and worn by anyone.

title: FuelCell SuperComp Trainer
description: The FuelCell SuperComp Trainer brings the seconds count performance of energy-return technology from race day to a high mileage training shoe. In this execution of new Energy Arc technology, a stacked height midsole houses an arched carbon fiber plate, sandwiched between two layers of FuelCell cushioning, leaving a hollow channel through the middle of the shoe. The plate is flattened into the void with each foot strike, and returns energy as it reshapes, creating a high rebound sense of propulsion. The FuelCell SuperComp Trainer is designed to look, feel, and perform differently.

title: Made in USA 990v6
description: The designers of the first 990 were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The MADE in USA 990v6 embraces this original mandate, with a series of performance-inspired updates. The upper dispenses with the standard midfoot saddle, allowing the pigskin and synthetic overlays to flow from heel to toe across the mesh underlay, for a speedy, streamlined look. While the evolved design marks one of the most dramatic changes from one generation model to the next that the 990 has ever seen, the greatest leap forward occurs on the inside. The addition of FuelCell midsole cushioning means that the evolution of the 990 can be felt as much as it can be seen.New Balance MADE contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

The 9060 is a new expression of the refined style and innovation-led design of the classic 99X series. The 9060 reinterprets familiar 99X elements with a warped sensibility inspired by the proudly futuristic, visible tech aesthetic of the Y2K era. A special-edition Moon Daze colorway outfits a premium nubuck and mesh upper construction in a grey colorway, with a unique stain finish.

description: The designers of the first 990 were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The 550’s low top, streamlined silhouette offers a clean take on the heavy-duty designs of the late ‘80s, and quickly became a global fashion favorite when it was reintroduced to the full time New Balance lineup in 2021. A special-edition Moon Daze colorway outfits a premium nubuck and mesh upper construction in a grey colorway, with a unique stain finish.

title: Made in USA 998 Core
description: A true embodiment of New Balance's timeless design and performance innovation returns to the MADE in USA lineup in 2023. The original 998, released in 1993, was the first shoe to utilize ABZORB cushioning. This revolutionary step forward in shock absorption was matched visually with a sleek update to the classic 99X series look. The MADE in USA 998 features an OG grey colorway in a premium pigskin suede and mesh upper construction. New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

title: Made in USA 990v4
description: The 990’s original designers were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The finished product more than lived up to its billing. When it hit shelves for the first time in 1982 the 990 sported an elegantly understated grey colorway, and a then unheard of three-figure price tag. For avid runners and ahead of the curve tastemakers alike, the 990 was a mark of quality and superior taste. There have been updates to the design since ’82, and more color options, but the 990’s aspirational status symbol aura has never changed. Simply put, the 990 is the shoe so good, that we’ve never stopped making it. The MADE in USA 990v4, originally introduced in 2016, continued to refine the v3's modernization of the silhouette. The Grey Day edition outfits a premium hairy suede and mesh upper with tonal grey, accented with hints of navy.New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

The 9060 is a new expression of the refined style and innovation-led design that have made the 99X series home to some of the most iconic models in New Balance history. The 9060 reinterprets familiar elements sourced from classic 99X models with a warped sensibility inspired by the proudly futuristic, visible tech aesthetic of the Y2K era. Sway bars, taken from the 990, are expanded and utilized throughout the entire upper for a sense of visible motion, while wavy lines and scaled up proportions on a sculpted pod midsole place an exaggerated emphasis on the familiar cushioning platforms of ABZORB and SBS.

Re-introducing a basketball legend. The return of the 550 pays tribute to the 1989 original that defined a hoops generation. Originally worn by pro ballers in the ’80s and ’90s, the new 550 is simple, clean and true to its legacy.

title: Made in USA 996
description: Introduced in 1988, the 996 was the first radical offshoot of the original 990. The 996’s technological features represented six years of evolution, and featured a subtly streamlined exterior design, making for an exceptionally wearable, high-performance shoe. The MADE in USA 996 is outfitted with a premium, pigskin hairy suede and mesh upper featuring a special-edition Grey Day colorway. The design is rounded out with a woven tongue label and sockliner.New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

title: Made in USA 998
description: A true embodiment of New Balance's timeless design and performance innovation returns to the MADE in USA lineup. The original 998, released in 1993, was the first shoe to utilize ABZORB cushioning. This revolutionary step forward in shock absorption was matched visually with a sleek updating of the classic 99X series look. The MADE in USA 998 features a special-edition Grey Day colorway, and premium, pigskin hairy suede and mesh upper construction.New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

title: MADE in USA 993 Core
description: Superior comfort meets classic style in our men’s Made in US 993 running shoe. A favorite from the legendary 990 series, the 993 features responsive cushioning and premium materials ready for a run or all-day wear. Manufactured in the US for over 75 years and representing a limited portion of our US sales, New Balance Made is a premium collection that contains a domestic value of 70% or greater.

title: 928v3
description: Stable and steady wins the race. The New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe features motion control and ROLLBAR stability technologies and ABZORB cushioning for comfort from morning till midnight.

The original 550 debuted in 1989 and made its mark on basketball courts from coast to coast. After its initial run, the 550 was filed away in the archives, before being reintroduced in limited-edition releases in late 2020, and returned to the full-time lineup in 2021, quickly becoming a global fashion favorite. The 550’s low top, streamlined silhouette offers a clean take on the heavy-duty designs of the late ‘80s, while the dependable leather upper construction is a classic look in any era.

With the new 650 silhouette, New Balance introduces a hi-top counterpart to the wildly popular 550. While 1980s on-court design combined supportive features with epic proportions, the 650 offers a streamlined, ready to wear look. A classic, leather upper is bolstered with a puff and stitch collar, for a subtle reinterpretation of molded foam construction, while a raw edged leather eyerow applies the shoe’s elevated construction to every level of detail.

title: 1540v3
description: Our 1540v3 is kitted out with technology that helps deliver mile-after-mile stability and combat overpronation. It's made with two layers of performance foam that offers superior support and a soft rebound. Designed with an ENCAP and Rollbar midsole technology, this runner offers rear foot movement control for feet on runs from 5K and beyond.This men’s runner is now in new seasonal colors.As of April 2021, the 1540v3 will no longer be produced in the United States.

title: Fresh Foam X More v4
description: The most Fresh Foam used in any shoe to date, the latest in the line utilizes more Fresh Foam X, stacks it higher than ever before, and distributes it across the length of the shoe, offering a plush, yet stable underfoot experience. A data driven outsole applies the strategic placement of dramatic cushion zones and drastic flex zones promoting a natural stride while the silhouette’s rocker profile promotes a smooth transition and ride. All of this sits beneath an engineered mesh upper that keeps you locked with breathable comfort and support. ​

title: Fresh Foam X More Trail v3
description: approach to outdoor functionality. A stacked height, dual-hardness Fresh Foam X midsole is paired with the superior grip of a Vibram® lugged outsole, for a blend of softness and structure. A breathable, engineered knit upper is equipped with printed, abrasion-resistant detailing, offering protection against trail debris. A special-edition Moon Daze colorway features a grey colorway, with a unique stain finish.

title: 2002R
description: The New Balance 2002R reintroduces a technical running favorite from the 2000s, outfitting the original design with modern performance upgrades. A synthetic upper construction is rendered with sleek curves and cutout segments for an updated take on a classic look. The performance of a Stability Web and N-ergy shock absorbing outsole stacked on an ABZORB midsole offer comfort and performance that can’t be pinned down with a date.

The 580 is one of the most distinctive models in New Balance history, and not simply because of its chunky, Rollbar-equipped, trail design. Originally an obscure, regional adaptation of the 585, the 580 began to turn heads as a fixture on the trendsetting streets of Harajuku. When it served as the canvas for some of the first-ever collaborative releases, the 580 became legendary. The newly reissued 580 brings an icon back to life. The modernized look of a slimmed down toe and reduced collar height is combined with construction that comes as close to a one-to-one recreation of the OG materials, compounds, and features as humanly possible.

Signature Fresh Foam X cushioning technology is paired with a lightweight, engineered knit upper, focused on breathability and stretch, and strategic supporting elements.

description: With a technical look and feel featuring an understated color and design, the New Balance Fresh Foam X 840v1 is a stylish and practical shoe ideal for low-impact activities or general everyday wear. The synthetic upper with no sew overlays provides a snug, comfortable fit and a sleek look, while the Fresh Foam X midsole, no-sew mid-foot support, and molded heel deliver exceptional comfort where you need it most.

title: MX608V5
description: Our 608v5 classic trainer features super-soft cushioning and a durable rubber outsole to deliver the support and comfort your feet need on a daily basis. This shoe was designed with comfort perks like an oversized ABZORB heel crash pad, a durable molded PU insert and relaxed fit last. Plus, a suede and mesh upper delivers a snug fit and breathable comfort.This shoe features a phantom liner for your comfort.

description: Jamie Foy's first pro model shoe for New Balance Numeric offers a more durable and breathable take on the traditional vulcanized skate shoe.

title: 2002R
description: The forward-thinking style of the 2002R is rooted in performance running. Inspired by the MR2002, a high-end running model originally released in 2010, the 2002R offers a ready-to-wear take on sleek, technical design. A classic, mesh upper construction is paired with cutout suede overlays, adding a rich layer of detail, while a diamond patterned ABZORB midsole and segmented ABZORB SBS pods at the heel pair an ultra-soft, cushioned feeling with a visually distinctive look.

title: 1906R
description: The iconic New Balance 1906R men's sneaker is back with fresh style. Named for the year New Balance was conceived and updated with an upper inspired by running shoe designs from the 2000s, this classic shoe continues to be a staple in the running world. Its N-ergy shock absorbing outsole features a Stability Web for added arch support, while an ACTEVA LITE midsole and ABZORB SBS heel cushioning offer comfort and stability. With the timeless 1906R, you get a stylish running shoe that performs.

description: Designed for use on gym floors, in batting cages, or taking some soft pre-game fungos, the New Balance Fresh Foam 3000 v6 Turf-Trainer has a full-length Fresh Foam midsole and synthetic/mesh upper, wrapping the foot in comfort on all sides. Performance meets style, as much of the design is inspired by New Balance's iconic heritage silhouettes. These training shoes utilize a one-piece, nubbed rubber outsole that provides traction on a variety of surfaces, meeting the versatile performance that elite players demand. One thing is for sure, rocking the 3000 v6 will have you comfortable and confident.

description: The New Balance Numeric 808 by Tiago Lemos is the newest addition to the NB Numeric line. Tiago’s second signature model for New Balance features late-90’s styling with modern NB technology. Full length ABZORB midsole, lace ghillies, Ndurance outsole and a layered upper are complemented by exaggerated N branding, giving the 808 a unique look. Additional features like the re-designed internal heel pod keep the foot locked in and secure. The 808 provides both comfort and durability, with Tiago’s distinct aesthetics.

title: Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid
description: People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there’s more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. Uneven terrain, debris, and moisture are unique challenges to footwear that require specialized construction. For those who take going off the beaten path literally, there’s the New Balance Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid, a dedicated, off-road application of our best running technology. These trail running shoes employ a Vibram® Megagrip outsole, mid-cut synthetic upper, and toe protection to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning.

title: NB Numeric Brandon Westgate 508
description: The Pro Model for NB# team rider Brandon Westgate, the NM508 is built on our classic indoor soccer outsole which gives you the board feel of a vulcanized shoe with the impact protection of a cupsole. The upper is made up of a perforated suede, one-piece reinforced toe to help minimize blowouts, while the foam backed mesh collar provides a comfortable, but snug fit. The exposed foam and mesh tongue help give the NM508 a retro feel while providing breathability while skating and the reflective heel detailing is designed to catch the light.

title: Fresh Foam Arishi v4
description: The Fresh Foam Arishi v4 is a versatile men’s shoe you can wear anywhere. Featuring a soft Fresh Foam cushioned midsole and breathable mesh upper, this athletic shoe blends next-level style with all-day comfort and performance. A sport-inspired paint application and durable rubber outsole complete the look and feel of this capable athletic shoe.

title: NB Numeric Jamie Foy 306
description: The New Balance NB Numeric Jamie Foy 306 is Jamie Foy's signature pro model shoe. These skateboarding shoes take the classic design of a vulcanized skate shoe and give it a modern upgrade. The upper features a strong rubber underlay for added durability to withstand your toughest tricks. The mesh panels provide much-needed breathability so you can ride your board all day in comfort. Upgraded components throughout the shoe ensure a secure fit and lasting protection.

A classic, leather upper is bolstered with a puff and stitch collar, for a subtle reinterpretation of molded foam construction, while a raw edged leather eyerow applies the shoe’s elevated construction to every level of detail.

title: 610T
description: Whether you're competing against the terrain, or a particularly trying day, the 610T is your best option. The fashionable 2000's trail-inspired design of these men's sneakers delivers versatility and comfort.

title: 840v5
description: Our comfortable and versatile 840V5 men's running shoe is designed for every runner. The full-length ABZORB midsole offers lasting cushioning and a responsive ride no matter your foot type, while the breathable mesh upper provides stretch for a supportive and stable fit where you need it.

title: Fresh Foam X 840Fv1
description: With a technical look and feel featuring an understated color and design, the New Balance Fresh Foam X 840F is a stylish and practical shoe ideal for low-impact activities or general everyday wear. The leather upper provides a snug, comfortable fit, while the Fresh Foam X midsole delivers exceptional cushioning where you need it most.

title: Fresh Foam X More Trail v3
description: Whether you’re looking for adventure or serenity in nature, the first thing you’ll need is the right pair of shoes. After all, the path to all those landscape views is filled with uneven terrain, exposed roots, loose rocks, and sticks. The Fresh Foam X More Trail v3 is built to make your excursions as easy on the feet as they are on the eyes, with a cushioning led approach to outdoor functionality. A stacked height, dual-hardness Fresh Foam X midsole is paired with the superior grip of a Vibram® lugged outsole, for a blend of softness and structure. A breathable, engineered knit upper is equipped with printed, abrasion-resistant detailing, offering protection against trail debris.

title: NB Numeric Tiago Lemos 808
description: The New Balance NB Numeric Tiago Lemos 808 by Tiago Lemos is the newest addition to the NB Numeric line. Tiago’s second signature model for New Balance features late-90’s styling with modern NB technology. Full-length ABZORB midsole, lace ghillies, NDurance outsole and a layered upper are complemented by exaggerated N branding, giving the 808 a unique look. Additional features like the re-designed internal heel pod keep the foot locked in and secure. The 808 provides both comfort and durability, with Tiago’s distinct aesthetics.

title: CT302
description: Thanks to its blend of performance qualities and understated, casual elegance, the classic tennis shoe is a timeless style fixture. The CT302 expands the everyday wearability of the classic court silhouette, with an infusion of exaggerated proportions and unexpected details. Using a 1980s on-court model, the CT300, as a launching point, the CT302 adds a stacked height midsole, an outsized take on the classic cup outsole design and ‘N’ logo, and a rubber toe wrap extending from the outsole, along with the use of curved and wavy lines throughout the design.

title: NB Numeric 272
description: The NM272 delivers everything you need in a durable skate shoe, while maintaining classic NB heritage in its design. Featuring a redesigned vulcanized sole for built-in comfort, this shoe also boasts a thin insole for incredible board feel.

title: CT302
description: Thanks to its blend of performance qualities and understated, casual elegance, the classic tennis shoe is a timeless style fixture. title: Furon v7 Pro FG
description: Explode down the pitch in our Furon V7 Pro FG soccer cleats, designed for the elite-level player who craves simplicity and direct contact with the ground and ball. Boasting a Hypoknit upper with mesh lining, plus off-set lacing with a cored-out canopy for lockdown and increased strike zone, this cleat delivers impressive support and comfort. Stay focused on firm ground with the lightweight nylon outsole, which offers dynamic feel and feedback.

title: FuelCell MD-X v2
description: Built for speed, the New Balance FuelCell MD-X is engineered for athletes competing in middle distance track races. This carbon fiber packed racing shoe features an ultra-lightweight engineered knit upper for ultimate weight savings. It's stacked with performance-driven technology such as FuelCell midsole foam and a carbon fiber plate help drive you forward.

‘The most New Balance shoe ever’ says it all, right? No, actually. The 574 might be our unlikeliest icon. The 574 was built to be a reliable shoe that could do a lot of different things well rather than as a platform for revolutionary technology, or as a premium materials showcase. This unassuming, unpretentious versatility is exactly what launched the 574 into the ranks of all-time greats. As hybrid road/trail design built on a wider last than the previous generation’s narrow racing silhouettes, the 574 offered a uniquely versatile mix of new, different, uncomplicated, rugged, durable, and comfortable that was adopted as a closet staple across the globe. That’s why today, the 574 is synonymous with the boundary defying New Balance style, and worn by anyone. This edition, the 574 Legacy, updates the classic with an elevated aesthetic.

title: NB Numeric Franky Villani 417
description: The Numeric team has been looking forward to Franky bringing his creative vision to a signature shoe. Franky's aesthetics and style guided the design process; merging skate heritage and a desire to evolve Numeric's visual language. Introducing the NM417 by Franky Villani, a mid-cut, vulcanized skate shoe for creative pursuits on and off the board. An instant classic, built on a modern herringbone tread, featuring an upper with 3x reinforcements in high-wear areas, and an Abzorb insole ensuring impact protection and comfy daily grinds. Franky tested and approved.

title: 2002RX
description: The New Balance 2002RX reintroduces a technical running favorite from the 2000s, outfitting the original design with modern performance upgrades. A suede and mesh upper construction offers an updated take on a classic look, finished with GORE-TEX® that keeps your feet dry with every season. The performance of a Stability Web and N-ergy shock absorbing outsole stacked on an ABZORB midsole offer comfort and performance that can’t be pinned down with a date.

description: The New Balance Made in UK 576 35th Anniversary celebrates our original 576 model with our iconic silhouette. Constructed in premium UK-made CF Stead suede and mesh with pigskin and synthetic details, these classic running shoes include our heritage ENCAP midsole cushioning and an original motion control CR device for added comfort with every step.Each MADE UK sneaker is crafted in our factory in Flimby, Cumbria, UK, and uniquely celebrates culture and style.

title: MADE in USA 990
description: New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

title: NB Numeric Tiago Lemos 1010
description: New Balance has a revered history of making technical performance footwear to meet the needs of professional athletes. New Balance Numeric continues this tradition with the 1010; our most technically advanced skate shoe to date. The 1010 features a full-length dual-density FuelCell midsole, for propulsive underfoot cushioning. An upper harnessing FantomFit and anatomical inner heel pods provide a secure lockdown fit. The 1010 blends New Balance and skate heritage perfectly for confidence both on and off the board. The 1010 is the signature model of Tiago Lemos.

Inspired by the original BB680 – game-worn by the pros – we recreated a timeless classic with a simple and clean look. On the 480, leather meets an Ortholite insert for all-over comfort and stability, all day long.

title: Rainier
description: An iconic, lightweight trail boot with colors and materials inspired by the 1982 classic.

The 580 is one of the most distinctive models in New Balance history, and not simply because of its chunky, Rollbar-equipped, trail design. Originally an obscure, regional adaptation of the 585, the 580 began to turn heads as a fixture on the trendsetting streets of Harajuku. When it served as the canvas for some of the first-ever collaborative releases, the 580 became legendary. The newly reissued 580 brings an icon back to life. The modernized look of a slimmed down toe and reduced collar height is combined with construction that comes as close to a one-to-one recreation of the OG materials, compounds, and features as humanly possible.

title: RAINIER LOW
description: Show your appreciation for authentic, sophisticated classics in our New Balance RAINIER LOW. These premium outdoor shoes feature a lightweight EVA bottom and Vibram outsole for superior grip.

title: 860v2
description: Bring classic style and comfort to everyday with the 860v2. This throwback men’s sneaker adds a sporty edge to your step. Modern tech ensures all-day comfort for a look good, feel good finish.Put a retro spin on your look with the 860v2.

title: Fresh Foam X 3000 V6 Metal
description: Introducing the New Balance Fresh Foam X 3000 V6 Metal, designed for supreme comfort and unrelenting confidence. Made with an innovative PU-coated mesh upper for a premium, soft feel that's still durable, these cleats deliver lasting performance. Underfoot, enjoy plush Fresh Foam X midsole cushioning and a flex zone in the 8-spike metal plate. Focus on the game, not on your gear – we've got you covered.

title: FRESH FOAM X KAIHA RD
description: Whether you’re getting in your daily steps or training for your next race, do it in style and extreme comfort with our Fresh Foam Kaiha Road. These men’s running shoes feature our most cushioned midsole stack height with Fresh Foam X technology that delivers plush cushioning. Luxuriously soft and comfortable, these durable shoes will take you from your morning walk to your next PB with ease.

title: Fresh Foam X 574 Cleat
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam 574 baseball cleat is inspired by the iconic 574 lifestyle shoe. Built for elite baseball and softball players, this unique offering combines the iconic outer shell of the 574 with a "baseball-ized" internal fit and feel, delivering on the very same comfort and performance that has become expected from New Balance Baseball. The 8-spike metal bottom helps to deliver traction on natural surfaces and the full-length Fresh Foam X midsole delivers precise cushioning underfoot.

title: RAINIER LOW
description: Show your appreciation for authentic, sophisticated classics in our New Balance RAINIER LOW. These premium outdoor shoes feature a lightweight EVA bottom and Vibram outsole for superior grip.

title: FuelCell SuperComp LD-X
description: Featuring a full-length carbon plate with four built-in pins for propulsion and traction, our FuelCell SuperComp LD-X will be your go-to competition spike for long distance races or the steeplechase. Designed to meet the needs of elite athletes, this track spike has a lightweight, high-rebound FuelCell midsole underfoot that provides exceptional energy return, along with innovative Energy Arc technology. The comfortable knit upper is reinforced at strategic points for a structured feel.

Inspired by the original BB680 – game-worn by the pros – we recreated a timeless classic with a simple and clean look. On the 480, leather meets an Ortholite insert for all-over comfort and stability, all day long.

title: NB Numeric 440
description: The NB Numeric 440 is a low-profile skate shoe with lineage tracing back to New Balance’s heritage of classic, 70’s style running shoes. With its C-CAP heel wedge helping to absorb impact and keep it lightweight, the 440 has the board feel of a vulcanized shoe with the impact protection of a cupsole. The upper is constructed with dual layers of suede in the high-wear zones along with breathable mesh side panels and reflective heel perforations, making the 440 not only comfortable, but extremely functional.

As recreational running established widespread popularity in the 1970s, the benchmark for running footwear shifted from mere existence to performance. While the era’s designs would be considered simple by today’s standards, the decade stands out as the moment when running shoes truly came into their own. The New Balance 327 sheds new light on the ‘70s as a time of innovation by boldly reshaping classic design elements with a thoroughly contemporary outlook. With an angular reworking of the tried-and-true wedge silhouette, outsize, asymmetrically applied ‘N’ branding, and wraparound, trail-inspired lug outsole, the New Balance 327 provides nothing less than a complete reimagination of our running heritage.

Inspired by the original BB680 – game-worn by the pros – we recreated a timeless classic with a simple and clean look. On the 480, leather meets an Ortholite insert for all-over comfort and stability, all day long.

title: Fresh Foam X 1080v12 Find Your Start
description: If we only made one running shoe, that shoe would be the 1080. What makes the 1080 unique isn’t just that it’s the best running shoe we make, it’s also the most versatile. The 1080 delivers top-of-the-line performance to every kind of runner, whether you’re training for world-class competition, or catching a rush hour train. The Fresh Foam X 1080v12 represents a consistent progression of the model’s signature qualities. The smooth transitions of the pinnacle underfoot cushioning experience are fine-tuned with updated midsole mapping, which applies more foam to wider areas of the midsole and increases flexibility at the narrower points. The ultra-modern outlook is also reflected in the 1080’s upper construction. This Find Your Start edition is part of our inclusive Global Running Day pack and features a welcoming design that embodies the joy of running.

title: FuelCell Propel v4
description: New and experienced runners alike will appreciate the smooth underfoot ride and innovative technology packed into the New Balance FuelCell Propel v4. Featuring a thick FuelCell midsole combined with a TPU plate, this running shoe is designed to maximize comfort and traction to help keep you moving at top speeds.

title: Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid GTX
description: People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there’s more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. Uneven terrain, debris, and moisture are unique challenges to footwear that require specialized construction. For those who take going off the beaten path literally, there’s the Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid, a dedicated, off-road application of our best running technology. The Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid employs a Vibram® Megagrip outsole, mid-cut synthetic upper with GORE-TEX® waterproof fabric, and toe protection to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning.

title: NB Numeric 22
description: The NM22 from New Balance Numeric is the skateboarding version of the Tempus indoor soccer shoe from the New Balance archives. Featuring a classic T-toe construction, but with a stitch and turn seam for added durability, the NM22 sits on a tried and true NB# vulcanized sole. The minimalistic detailing and the custom molded ABZORB insole provide a clean and classic aesthetic while not compromising on fit and comfort.

title: Fresh Foam X Hierro v7
description: People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there’s more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. The Fresh Foam X Hierro v7 employs a Vibram® outsole to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning and a breathable, lightweight upper.

title: Fresh Foam X Hierro v7 GTX
description: People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there’s more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. Uneven terrain, debris, and moisture are unique challenges to footwear that require specialized construction. For those who take going off the beaten path literally, there’s the Fresh Foam X Hierro, a dedicated, off-road application of our best running technology. The New Balance Fresh Foam X Hierro v7 GTX men's running shoe employs a Vibram® Megagrip outsole and a GORE-TEX® waterproof lining to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning.

title: MADE in USA 990
description: The 990’s original designers were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The finished product more than lived up to its billing. When it hit shelves for the first time in 1982 the 990 sported an elegantly understated grey colorway, and a then unheard of three-figure price tag. For avid runners and ahead of the curve tastemakers alike, the 990 was a mark of quality and superior taste. There have been updates to the design since ’82, and more color options, but the 990’s aspirational status symbol aura has never changed. Simply put, the 990 is the shoe so good, that we’ve never stopped making it. The 990v1 features a premium upper construction and ENCAP midsole cushioning.New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

The original 550 debuted in 1989 and made its mark on basketball courts from coast to coast. After its initial run, the 550 was filed away in the archives, before being reintroduced in limited-edition releases in late 2020, and returned to the full-time lineup in 2021, quickly becoming a global fashion favorite. The 550’s low top, streamlined silhouette offers a clean take on the heavy-duty designs of the late ‘80s, while the dependable synthetic leather upper construction is a classic look in any era.

title: NB Numeric Jamie Foy 306
description: The New Balance NB Numeric Jamie Foy 306 is Jamie Foy's signature pro model shoe. These skateboarding shoes take the classic design of a vulcanized skate shoe and give it a modern upgrade. The upper features a strong rubber underlay for added durability to withstand your toughest tricks. The mesh panels provide much-needed breathability so you can ride your board all day in comfort. Upgraded components throughout the shoe ensure a secure fit and lasting protection.

title: TWO WXY v3
description: textile upper allows for a secure lockdown fit, without adding extra weight.

The New Balance 5740 is the answer to a question that is simple, yet astronomical in scale. What if we updated the most New Balance shoe of all time – the 574? Despite its legacy of unassuming, almost effortless versatility, the original 574 was a unique design for its era, a hybrid road/trail design that didn’t lean on visible technical features. The 5740 approaches the hybrid concept with a few extra years’ worth of design developments to explore, and creates a new perspective on an iconic design. An overall sleeker silhouette provided by a slimmer last combines with a range of exaggerated features. The unique midsole combines a flared take on the classic 574 construction with ‘90s tech inspired details, while the mudguard and eyerow feature the distinctive wavy embellishments of the ‘80s.

title: NB Numeric Tom Knox 440
description: This skate shoe features a '70s-inspired upper atop a clean cupsole with midsole cushioning for comfort and dependability.

title: Fresh Foam X 880v13 Find Your Start
description: Function meets fashion the New Balance Fresh Foam X 880v13 Find Your Start. Featuring a plush and supportive Fresh Foam X midsole and NDurance rubber outsole, this shoe delivers enhanced performance and comfort with each step. Part of our Global Running Pack, this shoe features a fun, inclusive design that celebrates the welcoming spirit of running.

title: ALD x New Balance Rainier
description: Aimé Leon Dore and New Balance reintroduce a unique archival favorite: the Rainier boot. The original Rainier was developed in 1982, after the student guides at the Mount Rainier climbing school had taken to wearing running shoes instead of traditional, heavyweight hiking boots. The Rainier was designed as a lightweight alternative that offered climbing and hiking specific performance. Aimé Leon Dore’s take on the Rainier adds a touch of refinement to the rugged makeup, with a suede and Cordura® nylon upper construction and updated colorways. GORE-TEX® is utilized throughout, for weather-resistant functionality, while a Vibram® outsole offers durable, sure-footed traction.

title: Minimus TR BOA
description: Whether you're lifting weights or performing weekly HIIT workouts, our New Balance Minimus TR BOA men's training shoe is a must-have for anyone who craves support and a lightweight feel. The premium liners allow you to train without wearing socks, ensuring absolute comfort throughout each session. The TPU-infused design offers amazing durability and support. These performance trainers deliver enhanced cushioning without sacrificing stability, and the BOA® Performance Fit System lets you dial in to a precision fit.

title: Fresh Foam X Vongo v5
description: Our Fresh Foam X Vongo v5 men’s running shoe is designed for the perfect combination of softness and support. Featuring a plush Fresh Foam X midsole and a medial post, it provides a cushioned and stable ride with every stride.

title: NB Numeric Tiago Lemos 1010
description: The first pro model for skater Tiago Lemos, our New Balance Numeric NM1010 blends '90s-inspired style with cutting-edge design to create a go-to shoe for skating. With a suede and mesh upper, this nostalgic shoe features a plush FuelCell foam midsole to help deliver comfort and a reinforced feel. The no-sew overlays help finish this shoe off with a sleek finish to deliver the perfect look and fit.

title: MADE in UK 991v1
description: Constructed for comfort and style, the New Balance Made in UK 991v1 sneaker features a classic ABZORB midsole, providing a comfortable cushion. This iteration of our classic sneaker features a hairy suede and mesh upper with synthetic detailing in new seasonal colors for a fresh look and up-to-the-minute style.Each MADE UK sneaker is crafted in our factory in Flimby, Cumbria, UK, and uniquely celebrates culture and style.

title: 2002R
description: The New Balance 2002R reintroduces a technical running favorite from the 2000s, outfitting the original design with modern performance upgrades. A synthetic upper construction is rendered with sleek curves and cutout segments for an updated take on a classic look. The performance of a Stability Web and N-ergy shock absorbing outsole stacked on an ABZORB midsole offer comfort and performance that can’t be pinned down with a date.

title: Fresh Foam 3000v6 Charred Molded
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam 3000v6 Charred Molded celebrates the traditions of Japanese high school baseball with these triple-black spikes. When you open the box and pull these cleats out, you may think they were left on the grill for a bit too long, but all the features and comfort are intact with a PU-coated mesh upper, promoting breathability and durability. The TPU molded cleat outsole provides traction on both turf and natural surfaces for versatility, while the Fresh Foam midsole cushioning offers underfoot comfort for a more confident performance. For pitchers with excessive toe drag, we recommend using a toe-protection product to extend the life of your cleat.

title: Fresh Foam 574 Molded
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam 574 molded cleat is inspired by the iconic 574 lifestyle shoe. Built for elite baseball and softball players, this cleat combines classic colors with premium materials. The diamond-specific, TPU molded plate, helps to maximize traction on both turf and natural surfaces, and the full-length Fresh Foam midsole delivers precise cushioning underfoot, for a lightweight, smooth ride around the bags. The 574 cleated upper boasts all the same comfort and performance NB baseball spikes are known for, with the timeless aesthetic of the legendary 574.

The 9060 is a new expression of the refined style and innovation-led design that have made the 99X series home to some of the most iconic models in New Balance history. The 9060 reinterprets familiar elements sourced from classic 99X models with a warped sensibility inspired by the proudly futuristic, visible tech aesthetic of the Y2K era. Sway bars, taken from the 990, are expanded and utilized throughout the entire upper for a sense of visible motion, while wavy lines and scaled up proportions on a sculpted pod midsole place an exaggerated emphasis on the familiar cushioning platforms of ABZORB and SBS.

title: MADE in UK 991
description: Constructed for comfort and style, the MADE UK 991 men's sneaker features a classic ABZORB midsole, providing a comfortable cushion. This iteration of our iconic sneaker is dressed with a luxe leather, premium hand-crafted Harris Tweed® textile and synthetic upper in a design inspired by the classic donkey jacket for premium style.Each MADE UK sneaker is crafted in our factory in Flimby, Cumbria, UK, and uniquely celebrates culture and style.

title: Fresh Foam X 3000v6 Pearls
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam X 3000v6 Pearls celebrates the traditions of Japanese high school baseball with these triple-white colored cleats inspired by the color of a brand new ball. They're built with PU-coated upper mesh for breathability and durability on the field. The metal bottom is meant for playing baseball or softball on natural grass or dirt surfaces, and the precise Fresh Foam X midsole cushioning offers underfoot comfort for a more confident performance. Busting out a fresh pair of triple white diamond spikes can evoke the same feeling as opening a bucket full of brand new pearls for batting practice. For pitchers with excessive toe drag, we recommend using a toe-protection product to extend the life of your cleat.

title: NB Numeric 212 Pro Court
description: The Pro Court 212 is our adaptation of an original New Balance classic clay court tennis shoe from the 1970s. Already adopted by skaters and following requests by our team, our version retains the original relaxed shape but adds a double layer suede ollie area, asymmetrical material selections and a custom drop in PU insert for support, comfort and added durability.

description: The New Balance Fresh Foam Arishi v4 is a versatile athletic shoe you can wear anywhere. Featuring a soft Fresh Foam cushioned midsole, breathable mesh and textile upper, and durable rubber outsole, this sporty shoe blends next-level style with all-day comfort and performance.

A C-CAP heel wedge in the midsole helps protect against impact, while NDurance rubber outsole technology provides protection in high-wear areas to help you get more out of these trusted skate shoes.

title: Fresh Foam Garoé
description: Take to the trails with confidence in the New Balance Fresh Foam Garoé, designed with technology and comfort top-of-mind. This trail running shoe features a lightweight, ultra-plush Fresh Foam midsole and an AT Tread outsole for traction during all your on- and off-road activities. Add in the supportive upper with no-sew overlays, and this capable shoe offers versatility for trail running and beyond.

title: FuelCell 2190
description: Adventurers who want to stay off the beaten path will appreciate the New Balance FuelCell 2190. Designed to take you from the concrete jungle to the mountain trails, this shoe features bio-based FuelCell cushioning for a propulsive ride with a Rock Stop Plate outsole for superior traction on rugged terrain. A waterproof membrane helps keep your feet dry.

title: MADE in UK 576
description: The New Balance Made in UK 576 features our classic silhouette and construction in premium pig suede, mesh and synthetic materials for an iconic look that's still of the moment. These shoes include our classic ENCAP midsole cushioning and a motion control CR device for added comfort with every step.Each MADE UK sneaker is crafted in our factory in Flimby, Cumbria, UK, and uniquely celebrates culture and style.

title: Stray Rats x New Balance 580
description: The original 580 was popular because of its good looks, historic because it introduced the concept of collaborations, and legendary because it was nearly impossible to obtain a pair outside of Japan. In fact, unless you were plugged into the early days of internet sneaker culture, you probably wouldn’t have known the shoe existed at all. Stray Rats, a brand with lifelong connections to different subcultures, offer their own take on the iconic 580. Upper construction featuring nubuck and glossy nylon is outfitted in a blend of vibrant fluorescent shades and muted earth tones, inspired by the aesthetic conventions of 2007, the year the 580 debuted stateside. The unique color combinations pay tribute to the era of digital camera photos of sneaker collections, uploaded to message boards and forums, by evoking rare colorways set against home interior backgrounds.

The New Balance 340 men's flip-flop delivers casual comfort with every step. Lightweight EVA foam cushioning in the footbed helps keep this sandal soft and simple, for an easy summertime footwear option.

title: Fresh Foam 3000v6 Pearls Molded
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam 3000v6 Pearls Molded celebrates the traditions of Japanese high school baseball with these triple-white colored baseball cleats inspired by the color of a brand new ball. It's built with a PU-coated, synthetic mesh upper for impressive breathability and durability on the field. The TPU molded cleat outsole provides traction on both turf and natural surfaces for versatility, while the Fresh Foam midsole cushioning offers underfoot comfort for a more confident performance. Busting out a fresh pair of triple white diamond spikes can evoke the same feeling as opening a bucket full of brand new pearls for batting practice. For pitchers with excessive toe drag, we recommend using a toe-protection product to extend the life of your cleat.

title: DynaSoft 200v2 VRSTY
description: Slide on comfort with the New Balance DynaSoft 200v2 VRSTY. The unisex sandal features a soft DynaSoft footbed and Ground Contact foam for added cushioning. This sport slide is made from synthetic materials and delivers versatile style for any occasion.

title: NB Numeric 440
description: The NB Numeric 440 is a low-profile skate shoe with lineage tracing back to New Balance’s heritage of classic, 70’s style running shoes. description: The 990’s original designers were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The finished product more than lived up to its billing. When it hit shelves for the first time in 1982 the 990 sported an elegantly understated grey colorway, and a then unheard of three-figure price tag. For avid runners and ahead of the curve tastemakers alike, the 990 was a mark of quality and superior taste. There have been updates to the design since ’82, and more color options, but the 990’s aspirational status symbol aura has never changed. Simply put, the 990 is the shoe so good, that we’ve never stopped making it. The 990v3 features a premium upper construction and ENCAP midsole cushioning.New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. ‘The most New Balance shoe ever’ says it all, right? No, actually. The 574 might be our unlikeliest icon. As hybrid road/trail design built on a wider last than the previous generation’s narrow racing silhouettes, the 574 offered a uniquely versatile mix of new, different, uncomplicated, rugged, durable, and comfortable that was adopted as a closet staple across the globe. description: textile upper allows for a secure lockdown fit, without adding extra weight.

The New Balance 5740 is the answer to a question that is simple, yet astronomical in scale. What if we updated the most New Balance shoe of all time – the 574? Despite its legacy of unassuming, almost effortless versatility, the original 574 was a unique design for its era, a hybrid road/trail design that didn’t lean on visible technical features. The 5740 approaches the hybrid concept with a few extra years’ worth of design developments to explore, and creates a new perspective on an iconic design. An overall sleeker silhouette provided by a slimmer last combines with a range of exaggerated features. The unique midsole combines a flared take on the classic 574 construction with ‘90s tech inspired details, while the mudguard and eyerow feature the distinctive wavy embellishments of the ‘80s.

Made for multi-court play, these tennis shoes include a full-length NDurance outsole for superior grip underneath a synthetic and mesh upper for added durability. The locked-down feel and reliable fit help you stay confident through every match.

title: NB Numeric 213 Pro Court Mid
description: The New Balance NB Numeric 213 Pro Court Mid skate shoe is a classic skate version of our popular Pro Court model. A suede and canvas mid-cut upper atop a vulcanized sole delivers versatile heritage style with built-in reinforcements designed to withstand the abuse of skateboarding.

As recreational running established widespread popularity in the 1970s, the benchmark for running footwear shifted from mere existence to performance. While the era’s designs would be considered simple by today’s standards, the decade stands out as the moment when running shoes truly came into their own. The New Balance 327 sheds new light on the ‘70s as a time of innovation by boldly reshaping classic design elements with a thoroughly contemporary outlook. With an angular reworking of the tried-and-true wedge silhouette, outsize, asymmetrically applied ‘N’ branding, and wraparound, trail-inspired lug outsole, the New Balance 327 provides nothing less than a complete reimagination of our running heritage.

title: NB Numeric 288 Sport
description: Fans of the original NM288 have something new to love with our Numeric 288 Sport. These skate shoes are updated with a supportive C-CAP midsole for impact absorption and a bootie construction for comfortable support when you're skating. Plus, the rolled edge seaming protects the integrity of the shoe for long-lasting wear and the suede and mesh upper adds a stylish streetwear edge.

title: 200v2 Adjustable
description: The New Balance 200v2 Adjustable sandal is built for casual comfort. This sporty slide features a convenient hook-and-loop upper for an adjustable fit, and a DynaSoft midsole for plush underfoot cushioning.

The 9060 is a new expression of the refined style and innovation-led design that have made the 99X series home to some of the most iconic models in New Balance history. The 9060 reinterprets familiar elements sourced from classic 99X models with a warped sensibility inspired by the proudly futuristic, visible tech aesthetic of the Y2K era. Sway bars, taken from the 990, are expanded and utilized throughout the entire upper for a sense of visible motion, while wavy lines and scaled up proportions on a sculpted pod midsole place an exaggerated emphasis on the familiar cushioning platforms of ABZORB and SBS.

title: 847v4
description: Our 847v4 men's walking shoe features a TRUFUSE midsole, delivering premium cushioning for a responsive, comfortable feel. The rugged construction includes a ROLLBAR stability post, providing enhanced support to help you control your rear-foot movement. The TPU heel insert offers added structure for enhanced support where you need it most, complementing your natural movement. With a rugged rubber outsole, these shoes are built for outdoor conditions.

title: NB Numeric 440
description: Our Numeric 440 blends premier technology with soft cushioning to create a go-to shoe for both everyday skate and wear. Featuring a '70s-inspired suede and mesh upper, this updated classic boasts breathability and durability. A C-CAP heel wedge in the midsole helps protect against impact, while NDurance rubber outsole technology provides protection in high-wear areas to help you get more out of these trusted skate shoes.

title: MADE in USA 990v3
description: The 990’s original designers were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The finished product more than lived up to its billing. When it hit shelves for the first time in 1982 the 990 sported an elegantly understated grey colorway, and a then unheard of three-figure price tag. For avid runners and ahead of the curve tastemakers alike, the 990 was a mark of quality and superior taste. There have been updates to the design since ’82, and more color options, but the 990’s aspirational status symbol aura has never changed. Simply put, the 990 is the shoe so good, that we’ve never stopped making it. The 990v3 features a premium upper construction and ENCAP midsole cushioning. New Balance MADE U.S. footwear contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

title: Tekela v4 Magique FG
description: See the game differently in Tekela. Our Tekela V4 Magique FG soccer cleat is made to deliver zonal support and dynamic feedback. A synthetic laced upper with textile collar offers comfort, stability and a locked-in fit. A single-shot TPU outsole with multi-directional conical stud configuration is designed specifically for firm ground surfaces to help you master the pitch.

title: 997 Golf
description: Inspired by our next-generation 997H, the Men's 997 Golf is a progressive golf shoe that is set to be a modern favorite. A waterproof microfiber leather upper helps you stay dry and fresh during your round. An Abzorb midsole gives premium responsiveness and lightweight cushioning step after step. The Ndurance rubber outsole is designed to move naturally with your foot. Featuring Fast Twist 3.0 Pulsar® replaceable cleats.

title: MADE in UK Palace 991v1
description: After working with a cult classic for their collaborative New Balance debut, Palace take on a silhouette that needs no introduction, the MADE in UK 991. The visible tech features, stylized cutout overlay designs, and sleek, rounded silhouette have made the first 99X series shoe of the new millennium a perennial favorite. Palace introduce a multi-faceted, multi-environment twist to the design, through the use of bright colors and outdoor-ready materials. Pigskin and nubuck overlays are combined with a rugged ripstop upper and complimented with an array of co-branded details throughout the design. The end result is a uniquely adventurous take on a premium legacy.

title: NB Numeric 212 Pro Court
description: The Numeric 212 skate shoe is a classic skate version of our popular Pro Court model. A suede and canvas upper atop a vulcanized sole delivers versatile heritage style with built-in reinforcements designed to withstand the abuse of skateboarding.

title: 608v5
description: Our 608v5 classic trainer features super-soft cushioning and a durable rubber outsole to deliver the support and comfort your feet need on a daily basis. This shoe was designed with comfort perks like an oversized ABZORB heel crash pad, a durable molded PU insert and relaxed fit last. Plus, a suede and mesh upper delivers a snug fit and breathable comfort.This shoe features a phantom liner for your comfort.

title: NB Numeric Tiago Lemos 808
description: The NB Numeric Tiago Lemos 808 is Lemos' second pro model, designed for impact protection and durability. This skate shoe features suede overlays to reinforce high-wear areas of the upper, plus lace ghillies to prevent torn laces. Underfoot, a full-length ABZORB midsole absorbs impact to deliver all-day comfort.

title: NB Numeric 288 Sport
description: New Balance Numeric has taken a team favorite and made it even better. The 288 Sport features a new outsole for improved grip and a full length C-CAP midsole for impact protection while maintaining board feel. A 4-way stretch mesh “sock-like” collar construction provides a comfortable, secure fit and the clean one-piece toe means no blown-out stitching.

title: CT302
description: Thanks to its blend of performance qualities and understated, casual elegance, the classic tennis shoe is a timeless style fixture. The CT302 expands the everyday wearability of the classic court silhouette, with an infusion of exaggerated proportions and unexpected details. Using a 1980s on-court model, the CT300, as a launching point, the CT302 adds a stacked height midsole, an outsized take on the classic cup outsole design and ‘N’ logo, and a rubber toe wrap extending from the outsole, along with the use of curved and wavy lines throughout the design.

title: Made in USA 990v2
description: The 990’s original designers were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The finished product more than lived up to its billing. When it hit shelves for the first time in 1982 the 990 sported an elegantly understated grey colorway, and a then unheard of three-figure price tag. For avid runners and ahead of the curve tastemakers alike, the 990 was a mark of quality and superior taste. There have been updates to the design since ’82, and more color options, but the 990’s aspirational status symbol aura has never changed. Simply put, the 990 is the shoe so good, that we’ve never stopped making it. The 990v2 features a premium upper construction and ABZORB midsole cushioning.New Balance MADE contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance’s US sales.

title: New Balance 610v1
description: New Balance 610v1 is your best weapon. C-CAP cushioning provides underfoot support while the stylish 2000's trail-inspired design and suede and mesh upper on these men's sneakers deliver versatility and comfort.

title: MX857V3
description: Comfortable and functional, our versatile MX857V3 is an all-star shoe that works for the gym or in your everyday rotation. Featuring a durable leather upper, these men's training shoes include ROLLBAR technology for enhanced stability and support. A PU insert delivers underfoot comfort whether you're hitting the gym or your morning commute.

title: Fresh Foam Roav
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam Roav is built on design principles to limit material scrap creation and incorporate post-industrial waste, creating a shoe you can feel good about wearing. As performance-driven as it is environmentally conscious, this running shoe features a Fresh Foam midsole for underfoot cushioning and has a lightweight no-sew mesh upper for added comfort.

title: BB550
description: The original 550 debuted in 1989 and made its mark on basketball courts from coast to coast. After its initial run, the 550 was filed away in the archives, before being reintroduced in limited-edition releases in late 2020, and returned to the full-time lineup in 2021, quickly becoming a global fashion favorite. The 550’s low top, streamlined silhouette offers a clean take on the heavy-duty designs of the late ‘80s, while the dependable synthetic leather upper construction is a classic look in any era.

title: Fresh Foam X 1080 Unlaced
description: If we only made one running shoe, that shoe would be the 1080. What makes the 1080 unique isn’t just that it’s the best running shoe we make. It delivers the top-of-the-line performance of the best running shoe we make to every kind of runner. Whether you’re training for world-class competition, or catching a rush hour train, the versatile application of the 1080’s technological features allow you to do something more: more miles, more often, more comfortably. The Fresh Foam X 1080 Unlaced fine tunes the cushioning, weight, and flexibility ratio that makes the 1080 so adaptable to the stresses that occur during the course of every run. Signature Fresh Foam X cushioning technology is paired with a lightweight, engineered knit upper, focused on breathability and stretch, and strategic supporting elements.

title: Fresh Foam 3000 v6 Turf -Trainer
description: Designed for use in the gym, batting cages, or for pregame activities, our Fresh Foam 3000 v6 Turf-Trainer features a full-length Fresh Foam midsole for a comfortable underfoot feel. The perforated, synthetic upper offers added durability, structure, and easier cleanability. These baseball trainers have a nubbed rubber outsole that provides traction on a variety of surfaces for versatile performance. For pitchers with excessive toe drag, we recommend using a toe-protection product to extend the life of your cleat.

title: Fresh Foam Audazo v6 Pro Suede IN
description: Master the court in style with the New Balance Audazo v6 Pro Suede IN. This football shoe features an improved last that brings you closer to the ground, and improved toe shape to assist with toe shots while accommodating the foot's natural shape. The lightweight suede upper has mesh detailing for breathability and a durable rubber toe-protect print for flexibility. Fresh Foam midsole cushioning provides superior underfoot comfort while the rubber outsole offers traction and durability with multi-directional tread for indoor and hard Futsal surfaces.

title: MADE in UK 1500
description: Pulling inspiration from leather-bound books, this iteration of our MADE UK 1500 features a luxe leather upper with premium suede and synthetic detailing to add an elevated aesthetic to your daily looks. Crafted from premium materials, these casual shoes also include classic ENCAP midsole cushioning for comfort and support with every step.Each Made in UK sneaker is crafted in our factory in Flimby, Cumbria, UK, and uniquely celebrates culture and style.

title: Tekela v4 Pro FG
description: See the difference Tekela makes. Our Tekela V4 Pro FG soccer cleat is made to deliver zonal support and dynamic feedback to elite-level players. A full-foot stretch-knit upper with laceless closure and a directional heel lining offers secure lockdown, bringing you closer to the ball. A lightweight nylon outsole with multi-directional conical stud configuration and TPU angled rim studs at the forefoot is designed specifically for firm ground surfaces to help you master the pitch with lightening fast turns.

title: Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid
description: People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there’s more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. Uneven terrain, debris, and moisture are unique challenges to footwear that require specialized construction. For those who take going off the beaten path literally, there’s the Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid, a dedicated, off-road application of our best running technology. The Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid employs a Vibram® Megagrip outsole, mid-cut synthetic upper, and toe protection to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning.

title: NB Numeric 288 Sport
description: The NM288S modernizes a classic skate shoe with an improved fit and sleek feel. Playing on early '90s heritage court models, this skate shoe features a premium leather and mesh upper with a gum rubber outsole. An updated aesthetic makes this shoe the ultimate option for comfortable all-day wear with reinforcements designed to withstand daily boarding.

title: NB Numeric Brandon Westgate 913
description: The New Balance NM913 comes with the innovative technology skaters crave. Designed for NB team rider Brandon Westgate, these skate shoes have a REVlite midsole and N2 heel pad, offering the lightweight cushioning and impact protection needed for fearless shredding. The TPU lace cage provides extra durability while the mesh panels provide comfortable air flow. These skateboarding shoes feature core colors for a timeless skater-approved look.

title: NB Numeric 425
description: Get back to basics with our Numeric 425, featuring the classic court design you know and love. These stylish skate shoes sport a one-piece, reinforced suede toe and synthetic/mesh upper for durability, and a C-CAP wedge in the heel for even more comfort and support. These versatile shoes are available in core colors for easy styling.

title: Fresh Foam Arishi v4
description: The Fresh Foam Arishi v4 is a versatile men’s shoe you can wear anywhere. Featuring a soft Fresh Foam cushioned midsole, breathable mesh upper and durable rubber outsole, this athletic shoe blends next-level style with all-day comfort and performance.

The New Balance 530 sneaker is a throwback to one of our classic running looks. This casual shoe combines everyday style with the modern technology of ABZORB cushioning for superior comfort underfoot. Put a 2000's technical spin on your running style with the 530 sneaker.

title: FreezeLX v4 Low
description: Blow past the competition with the FreezeLX v4 Low, our lightest lacrosse cleat yet, featuring an innovative QUIX outsole for traction during quick, cutting movements on the field. These lacrosse cleats also feature a hybrid tongue and a sleek synthetic and mesh upper for a comfortable, light-on-your-feet feel.

title: Fresh Foam Arishi v4 GTX
description: Hit the road in any weather with the New Balance Fresh Foam Arishi v4 GTX running shoe. Designed to be capable, comfortable and durable, this runner features Fresh Foam midsole cushioning for a plush underfoot feel, and GORE-TEX® waterproof fabric in the upper to help keep feet protected.

description: Our off-field inspired FreezeLX v4 Turf has a specially designed NDurance outsole for traction, durability and versatility on field turf surfaces. These lacrosse shoes also feature a synthetic/mesh upper and a traditional tongue design for a comfortable fit and feel through any game.

description: The 990’s original designers were tasked with creating the single best running shoe on the market. The finished product more than lived up to its billing.
